chara.textHome: The merriest of seasons greetings to all!

A spell of happiness for the day shall
be cast upon those fortunate enough
to meet Miss Santa.

Good morning.
The air is still quite chilly outside and
yet I must rise at this early hour.

Miss Santa must be a good role model
for the children.

Word of a restaurant that prepares
Christmas-themed Chinese dishes
upon request has reached my ears...

Just what could they be?
My interest has been piqued...
I am awaiting Tsukasa's arrival.

She's quite busy and has been late
in the past. However, I haven't the
slightest doubt that she will come.

I have but one wish for Santa before
I turn in for the night...
to see Tsukasa again tomorrow.

I have revered this outfit since
I was quite little.

I mean, Miss Santa can cast magic
that brings happiness to all children!

The time has come for Tsukasa and me
to depart to eliminate Witches.

Miss Santa shall cast her magic to dispose
of this threat and protect the children!
I witnessed a copy of Alina...

my apologies,
Miss Alina dressed in a Christmas outfit
within the Mirrors Labyrinth...
Whatever could it mean?

Miss Santa came to my rescue
when I had become lost many years ago...

The only explanation I could fathom
was that she had used magic.

I prepared this outfit specifically to attend
a Christmas party with Tsukasa.
I'm very much looking forward to it.

One of Sankyoya's signature
Christmas sweets, chilled matcha cake,
is to be made available soon...

How wonderful it would be
to have one with Tsukasa.

There are those even among Magical Girls
who cannot feel holiday cheer...

As Miss Santa, I would love to bestow them
with happiness.

My family is well aware that I shall be
attending a Christmas party,

but I have naturally kept my intent
to see Tsukasa a secret from them.

My favorite accessory is
this ribbon with bells.
It has the same bells that adorn Tsukasa's.

While I don't consider myself lacking
in friends, the only one with whom
I exchange presents is Tsukasa...
Ah, perhaps I am short on friends after all?

I've only just realized that,
with a change in color scheme, 
the fur adorning Mifuyu's Magical Girl form
could look very similar to that of Miss Santa!
What...? I-it suits me, does it?

...Being told that so formally
is slightly embarrassing...
